translation.en: [man] Four-star general.
There is no rank higher in the United States military.
translation.fr: Le plus haut grade de l'armée américaine.

translation.en: You report only to Sec Def and POTUS, the commander in chief.
translation.fr:
Vous ne répondez qu'au Président
et au secrétaire à la Défense.

translation.en: Congratulations, General Naird.
[Mark Naird] Thank you. Thank you.
It has always been my dream to command a service branch.
translation.fr:
J'ai toujours rêvé
de diriger une branche de l'armée.

translation.en: I have been shot down, both literally and figuratively,
translation.fr:
Ça a été un vrai parcours du combattant,
au sens propre comme au sens figuré,

translation.en: but I have always gotten back up.
All right.
My old CO used to say that the greatest asset in an F-35,
translation.fr:
Mon ancien chef de corps
disait que le plus précieux dans un F35,

translation.en: and that is a $100 million plane,
is its pilot.
When I was-- All right. I'll skip ahead. There's much more that I could say.
translation.fr:
Quand je... D'accord, je zappe.
J'aurais bien des choses à dire.

translation.en: I only wish that...
my parents could have been here to see this.
translation.fr:
c'est que mes parents
ne soient pas là pour me voir.

translation.en: But they were unable to get flights from New Jersey in time.
translation.fr:
Ils n'ont pas trouvé de vol
depuis le New Jersey.

translation.en: Maggie, Erin, this is a Naird family team win.
translation.fr:
Maggie, Erin,
c'est une réussite familiale.

translation.en: -So proud of you. -Thanks.
I don't get it.
Dad, when you made three-star, we had 100 guests and a band.
translation.fr:
Pour tes trois étoiles,
il y avait 100 invités et une fanfare.

translation.en: It's a different administration, bug.
This one's... a little more chaotic.
translation.fr: Celui-ci est un peu plus chaotique.

translation.en: The Air Force chief's house in Arlington is gorgeous and comes with a staff.
translation.fr:
Le logement de fonction est splendide,
il y a même du personnel.

translation.en: Thank you.
Dad, I am so proud of you.
translation.fr: Papa, je suis super fière de toi.

translation.en: -Thanks. -General.
Joint Chiefs in five minutes. Come on.
Kick.
Get lost, Naird. This is for four-stars.
Like me.
They didn't tell you? Or did you forget?
translation.fr: On ne t'a pas prévenu, ou tu as oublié ?

translation.en: Like you forgot to get competitive bidding for the AT-6B.
translation.fr:
Comme tu as oublié
de faire une offre pour l'AT-6B.

translation.en: Tell me what? That you wear a dress?
translation.fr: Prévenu que tu portais une robe ?

translation.en: I knew that already.
Gender roles.
Offensive. And out of date. Just like you. But I don't have to listen to it anymore.
translation.fr:
Désobligeant et démodé.
Comme toi. Mais je n'ai plus à subir ça.

translation.en: Good luck with your retirement, Kick.
And I say that facetiously,
translation.fr: Je dis ça au second degré.

translation.en: because you're a crook and a womanizer, and I hate your guts.
translation.fr:
Tu es abject, lubrique,
et je ne peux pas t'encadrer.

translation.en: God, that felt good.
Welcome, gentlemen, thank you for joining us. POTUS wants to make some changes.
translation.fr:
Merci d'être venus.
Le Président veut du changement.

translation.en: He's tweeting about it in five minutes, so let's hope you like it.
translation.fr:
Il le tweete dans cinq minutes.
J'espère que ça vous plaira.

translation.en: I wanna welcome our newest four-star general, Mark Naird,
translation.fr:
Bienvenue
au nouveau général quatre étoiles, Mark Naird,
ancien numéro deux de l'Air Force.

translation.en: formerly number two at the Air Force.
translation.fr:
Mark Naird,
ancien numéro deux de l'Air Force.

translation.en: He's done an amazing job, has a most distinguished career.
-Our nation's internet in-- -[Mark] Excuse me.
Why is Kick still in the room? I don't-- Hmm.
Our nation's internet, including Twitter,
runs through our vulnerable space satellites.
translation.fr:
passe par nos satellites,
qui sont vulnérables.

translation.en: POTUS wants complete space dominance.
translation.fr:
Le Président
veut une domination spatiale totale.

translation.en: Boots on the moon by 2024.
To that end, the president is creating a new branch.
translation.fr:
Pour ce faire,
il crée une nouvelle branche.

translation.en: Space Force.
Which Mark will run.
[scoffs] Hmm? What?
In close cooperation with Air Force, which Kick will still head.
translation.fr:
De concert avec l'Air Force,
toujours dirigée par Kick.

translation.en: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.
[John] This is not a joke. His words!
Boots on the moon in 2024.
Actually, he said, "Boobs on the moon," but we believe that to be a typo.
translation.fr:
Enfin, il a dit : "Objectif Tune,"
mais c'était une faute de frappe.

translation.en: This is bullshit. Space is part of the air.
Naird works for me.
Uh, hang on. Hang on. I don't think there's air in space.
translation.fr:
Pas si vite.
Il n'y a pas d'air dans l'espace.

translation.en: There certainly isn't any damn water, Admiral, so you don't get an opinion.
translation.fr:
Ni d'eau, amirale,
donc votre avis ne compte pas.

translation.en: Air Force used to just be part of the Army, Kick.
translation.fr:
L'Air Force
faisait partie de l'armée de terre.

translation.en: I'd like to stuff you both back in.
If there's no air or water, two questions.
translation.fr: S'il n'y a ni air ni eau,

translation.en: What is it exactly, and why can't they hear you scream?
translation.fr:
qu'est-ce que l'espace,
et pourquoi personne n'y entend crier ?

translation.en: Well, at least Coast Guard isn't last in line anymore.
translation.fr:
Au moins, la garde côtière
n'est plus la pire branche.

translation.en: -Oh, you're still last. -Oh, definitely last.
You're behind Salvation Army, Louis.
So, how are you handling this?
I know you wanted the Air Force, and you're not the most flexible person.
translation.fr:
Tu voulais l'Air Force
et tu n'es pas très flexible.

translation.en: [Mark] I can be flexible if I'm ordered to be.
translation.fr: Je peux l'être, si on me l'ordonne.

translation.en: I'll admit I was a little disappointed at first.
translation.fr:
Je dois avouer
qu'au début, j'ai été un peu déçu.

translation.en: But then I saw this painting. John Paul Jones.
translation.fr: Et puis, j'ai vu ce tableau. John Paul Jones.

translation.en: And it made me think.
The founder of the Space Force, that's going to be me.
translation.fr:
Je vais être
le fondateur de la Space Force.

translation.en: This is such a great opportunity to start something from the ground up.
translation.fr:
C'est une occasion en or.
On va tout créer à partir de rien.

translation.en: We're gonna build a huge new base.
translation.fr: On va construire une base immense.

translation.en: Well, DC real estate, the way it is,
translation.fr: Vu le prix de l'immobilier à DC,

translation.en: you'll be lucky if it's this side of Dulles Airport.
translation.fr: tu vas te retrouver vers l'aéroport.

translation.en: Oh, well, it's definitely gonna be on the other side of Dulles.
translation.fr: Plus loin que ça, à vrai dire.

translation.en: By about 2,000 miles.
-We're going to Colorado. -What?
There's this old NORAD facility that's got a lot of potential.
translation.fr:
Il y a une ancienne base du NORAD
qui a un potentiel énorme.

translation.en: And Colorado? Oh!
Up and coming. Did you know Amazon put their new headquarters there?
translation.fr:
Ça a la cote. Tu sais
qu'Amazon y a installé son nouveau QG ?

translation.en: Really?
No. But they seriously considered it.
You and Erin are gonna love it there.
-Gonna learn how to ride horses. -[sobs]
[Mark] It's gonna be a good year.
And next year at this time...
translation.fr: Et dans un an, jour pour jour,

translation.en: we might have boots on the moon.
Big launch today, huh?
Launch?
At the new base.
What base?
Oh, right. It's a secret. If you told me, you'd have to kill me, right? [laughs]
translation.fr:
J'oubliais, c'est secret.
Si vous m'en parlez, vous devez me tuer.

translation.en: ♪ That's what I wanted to be ♪
♪ But now that I am a spaceman ♪
There's a guy in the trunk. Hold him till after the launch.
translation.fr:
Détenez le type dans le coffre
jusqu'au lancement.

translation.en: What the fuck, man?
So then you say do bat your eye--
translation.fr: Puis, vous dites de s'en faire...

translation.en: -Big launch today, sir. -Yes.
The congressional delegation will be arriving for lunch.
translation.fr: La délégation du Congrès arrive à midi.

translation.en: You have to speak for ten minutes -at the local high school. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Vous devez faire un discours au lycée.

translation.en: Don't worry. We have a new helo pilot. We'll get you in and out of there in no time.
translation.fr:
Avec la nouvelle pilote d'hélico,
vous serez vite revenu.

translation.en: And the launch at 1700
is set to be a live feed on the East Coast.
translation.fr: retransmis en direct sur la côte Est.

translation.en: You have a light day today, so you can start in the gym,
translation.fr: Commencez par la salle de sport,

translation.en: and your calendar says it's a leg day.
Dr. Mallory.
Oh! Dr. Mallory is waiting for you. Yes, he is.
translation.fr:
- Le Dr Mallory vous attend.
- Oui, j'ai vu.

translation.en: -He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.fr:
- Il m'a dit de ne rien dire.
- Merci, Brad.

translation.en: [Mallory] We need to cancel the launch.
translation.fr: Il faut faire annuler le lancement.

translation.en: Senator Schugler, Pitosi, and the angry young congresswoman are coming.
translation.fr:
Il y aura le sénateur Schugler,
Pitosi et la jeune parlementaire énervée.

translation.en: They need to see a success so we can keep our funding.
translation.fr: Sans lancement réussi, pas de financement.

translation.en: Oh. My idea of success
would not be a six-billion-dollar piece of hardware
translation.fr:
ou un appareil
coûtant six milliards de dollars

translation.en: breaking up over Denver.
That is not going to happen.
Look, I don't like to pull rank,
translation.fr: Je déteste jouer la carte hiérarchique,

translation.en: -but I order you to postpone the launch. -Ah...
translation.fr:
mais je vous ordonne
de repousser le lancement.

translation.en: Okay?
There's too much moisture in the air.
We prefer a less ionized environment.
translation.fr:
Nous préférons
une atmosphère moins ionisée.

translation.en: You are a civilian advisor.
There are always going to be risks.
translation.fr: Il y aura toujours des risques.

translation.en: Conditions are never perfect.
translation.fr: Les conditions ne seront jamais parfaites.

translation.en: They're supposed to be perfect tomorrow.
The delegation will be back in Washington tomorrow.
-You know, Mark, when I hired you... -I hired you.
translation.fr:
- Je vous ai engagé...
- Qui a engagé qui ?

translation.en: ...I felt your best quality was your ability to listen to good advice.
translation.fr:
...pour votre capacité
à tenir compte des conseils.

translation.en: If you've lost that, we may have to look elsewhere.
translation.fr:
Si vous perdez cela,
nous devrons vous remplacer.

translation.en: We. Who is this "we" that you keep talking about?
translation.fr: C'est qui, ce "nous" dont vous parlez ?

translation.en: That is above your pay grade.
Nothing is above my pay grade at this base.
translation.fr: Je suis habilité à tout savoir, ici.

translation.en: Just postpone the launch, dear.
So, no launch today, I hear.
No, launch is still on.
Oh. I'll have to tell the base biologist.
-What? -She has to collect
all the endangered lizards within 600 yards of the launch site.
translation.fr:
Elle ramasse les lézards menacés
autour du site.

translation.en: I canceled her because Mallory told me the launch was scrubbed.
translation.fr: Mallory m'a dit d'annuler, j'ai obéi.

translation.en: No! Nobody gets to scrub anything but me.
translation.fr: Non ! Il n'y a que moi qui puisse annuler.

translation.en: Oh. Got it, sir.
Hello, Yuri.
Oh. Uh, Yuri's in there.
-I know. -He told me not to say anything.
translation.fr:
- J'ai vu.
- Il m'a dit de ne rien dire.

translation.en: Thank you, Brad.
[with Russian accent] Do you keep breath mints anywhere?
What are you doing in here?
Um, I heard the launch was scrubbed.
That is not accurate, Yuri.
Call me Bobby. It's more reassuring.
Can I see technical specifications for the Epsilon part E-16f fuel pump?
translation.fr:
Puis-je voir les détails techniques
de la pompe E-16F d'Epsilon ?

translation.en: Why would you need to see that?
Well, as observer from ISS partner country, I just want to... observe it.
translation.fr:
Je suis observateur d'un pays partenaire,
je veux juste observer.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, that is weird.
Your president desires close cooperation and good relations between US and Russia.
translation.fr:
Votre Président veut une coopération
en bons termes avec la Russie.

translation.en: Come on. We're not China here.
translation.fr: Allez, quoi, on n'est pas la Chine.

translation.en: I'm sure if the president would like me to show you something, he will let me know.
translation.fr:
Si je dois vous montrer quelque chose,
le Président me le dira.

translation.en: Very well. Expect a text from the secure phone.
translation.fr:
Très bien.
Par texto sur la ligne sécurisée.

translation.en: How do you know about the secure phone?
I don't know about the secure phone.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas au courant.

translation.en: -You just said "secure phone." -No, I didn't.
-Yes, you did. You said "secure phone." -I didn't say that.
You just said it.
-No, I did not. -Yes, you did.
Breath mints.
Here they are.
[sergeant] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
[soldiers] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
[sergeant] ♪ Outer space is very cold ♪
translation.fr: Dans l'espace, on va se les peler.

translation.en: [soldiers] ♪ Outer space is very cold... ♪
translation.fr: Dans l'espace, on va se les peler.

translation.en: -General Naird. -We may have to scrub the Epsilon launch.
-Is Yellowjacket ready to show off? -I doubt it.
Oh, for Christ's sake. They're a billion dollars and six months over.
translation.fr: Bordel ! Avec ce budget et ce retard ?

translation.en: You're right. We should be able to see something.
-Damn right. Let's move. -I'll make a call.
-Are you running? -No. Keep up.
Will Yellowjacket be impressive enough?
First super-pressurized ultra-fast satellite-killer killer missile?
Fucking impressive to me.
Oh. Hey. Looks good.
-Yeah. -[Mark] Sweet. Very sleek. -Like the yellow fins. -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr:
Super. Très élégant.
J'aime les ailerons jaunes.

translation.en: Do we have enough of these to do a test launch later as well?
translation.fr:
On en a assez
pour une démonstration, après ?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Okay, let's do this.
-Go time. -[man on radio] Roger that, go time.
Well, that's not ready yet.
-How much was that prototype? -Four.
-Million? -Middle schools.
Cost as much as four new middle schools.
Fuck!
-You are running! -Keep up.
So I hear we're going with Yellowjacket this afternoon?
Sorry, Sheila. Still have to grab those lizards.
Oh. Fuck Tony's in there.
-Good morning, my general. -Good morning.
I have your daily tweet ready for you to review,
translation.fr: Vous voulez lire votre tweet du jour ?

translation.en: and I think you're gonna love it. You're gonna eat it up. Go. Yum-yum.
translation.fr:
Vous allez adorer.
Vous allez kiffer. Regardez.

translation.en: I don't get it.
Any of it?
All right.
-You know there's a new Star Wars out? -Yes.
translation.fr:
- Il y a un nouveau film Star Wars.
- Oui.

translation.en: And Wendy's has a new hamburger that they're serving rare, so...
translation.fr:
Le fast-food Wendy's
sert un burger saignant.

translation.en: So what I am saying is that if I had a lightsaber, I would be able to cook...
translation.fr:
Donc je dis qu'avec un sabre laser,
je pourrais mieux...

translation.en: this hamburger better.
There you go. It took a while, but you got it.
-How is this relevant to the mission? -That is culturally relevant.
translation.fr: Quel rapport avec nous ? Un rapport culturel.

translation.en: I don't see how being snarky about a fast-food hamburger
translation.fr:
Je ne vois pas en quoi
critiquer un hamburger,

translation.en: is culturally anything.
Do you even understand what is at stake here?
translation.fr: Vous comprenez ce qui est en jeu ?

translation.en: I'm trying to put boots on the moon.
Boots on the moon.
A laser sword is a child's toy.
It's a lightsaber.
Did you hear yourself? Laser sword?
Okay. I think we're done.
-You don't understand because you're old. -Okay.
translation.fr: Vous êtes trop vieux pour comprendre.

translation.en: You get likes by dunking on the Twitter accounts
translation.fr:
On récolte des likes
grâce à des tweets cinglants

translation.en: -of sassy fast-food brands. -Sassy.
I don't even know why I'm explaining clapback theory to you.
translation.fr:
À quoi bon
vous expliquer la théorie du clash ?

translation.en: Every time I explain anything, it seems to just go "phew."
translation.fr: Ça vous passe au-dessus de la tête.

translation.en: How about this for sass?
-You're fired. -What?
Your services will no longer be needed here at Space Force.
translation.fr: Vos services ne sont plus requis.

translation.en: You're firing me for writing a perfect tweet? Is that why you're firing me? Fine, fine, fine. You know what?
translation.fr:
À cause d'un tweet parfait ?
C'est ça ? Très bien. Vous savez quoi ?

translation.en: Enjoy your 3,000 engineer followers, because, honestly, you are hopeless.
translation.fr:
Vos followers sont tous ingénieurs,
vous êtes un cas désespéré.

translation.en: Would you make sure that Tony is detained until after the launch so he doesn't tweet anything snotty?
translation.fr:
Faites détenir Tony jusqu'au lancement
pour éviter un tweet revanchard.

translation.en: -[Brad] Got it. -Thank you.
-Secure the phone. -Yes, sir.
What's going on? Are you serious? Stop-- Siri, send tweet. Send tweet!
translation.fr:
Sérieux ? Arrêtez !
Siri, publie mon tweet !

translation.en: [gasps] Ooh, gotcha.
A little low, don't you think?
I'm flying safely, sir.
But I can lift up if you like.
At your discretion.
You're, uh-- You're rated for F-35s, aren't you, sir?
translation.fr: Vous savez piloter un F35, non ?

translation.en: Yes, I believe I've flown every F series from the Tomcat to the F-117 Nighthawk.
translation.fr:
J'ai piloté tous les avions de série F,
du Tomcat au F117 Nighthawk.

translation.en: That's dope, sir.
What's your name?
Captain Angela Ali, sir.
ROTC?
OCS. Uh, I'm actually a prior. I transferred as a First Class, sir.
translation.fr:
Élève-officier, sortie du rang.
J'étais soldat de première classe.

translation.en: Air Force or Space Force?
Space Force, sir.
You don't like to use your full title?
Sorry, sir.
Spaceman First Class.
Nothing to be ashamed of.
Air Force has airmen. Space Force has spacemen.
translation.fr:
L'Air Force a ses aviateurs,
on a des astrosoldats.

translation.en: Nothing embarrassing or comical about it.
translation.fr: Ce n'est ni gênant ni comique.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
[Mark] The Earth is the only planet in our universe that we know of
translation.fr:
La Terre
est la seule planète de l'univers, à notre connaissance, où la vie existe.

translation.en: that sustains life.
translation.fr: à notre connaissance, où la vie existe.

translation.en: Fifty years ago,
Americans landed on the lunar surface and took that photo.
translation.fr:
des Américains ont aluni
et ont pris cette photo.

translation.en: Hashtag "awesome," huh?
Well, guess what, kids?
We're going back.
Not for science this time. Not to collect a bunch of rocks.
translation.fr:
Pas pour la science.
Pas pour ramasser des cailloux.

translation.en: But to occupy.
Boots on the moon!
Boots on the moon.
And even though this will be an international mission,
translation.fr:
Et même s'il s'agit
d'une mission internationale

translation.en: harnessing the best and brightest minds from around the globe,
translation.fr:
avec l'aide des cerveaux
les plus brillants du monde entier,

translation.en: rest assured these will be US boots.
translation.fr:
l'empreinte que nous laisserons
sera américaine.

translation.en: Boots with US feet in 'em, I mean.
translation.fr: Les pieds qui la laisseront, en tout cas.

translation.en: Can't be certain where the boots will actually be made.
translation.fr:
On ignore
où sera confectionné le scaphandre.

translation.en: Maybe Mexico. Maybe Portugal.
We're getting bids on the boots.
One thing's for certain, though.
Those boots are gonna have our feet in 'em.
Seniors,
if you enlist for a four-year stint as a space cadet,
translation.fr:
Si vous vous engagez
pour quatre ans dans la Space Force,

translation.en: you can earn up to $35,000 for college.
translation.fr:
vous gagnerez jusqu'à 35 000 $
pour payer vos études.

translation.en: I don't know what else to call it but a pretty sweet deal.
translation.fr:
En ce qui me concerne,
je trouve ça pas mal du tout.

translation.en: So what's it gonna be?
You gonna sit there like an idiot doing nothing?
translation.fr:
Vous allez rester là sans rien faire,
comme des idiots ?

translation.en: Or are you gonna join Space Force
and shoot for the stars?
Thank you.
Thank you. Thanks for coming.
-We're signing up, General. -See you on the moon, gentlemen.
translation.fr:
- On s'engage !
- Rendez-vous sur la Lune.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, bug. I need $100.
translation.fr:
- Coucou, ma puce.
- Il me faut 100 $.

translation.en: Bobby's taking me to the desert for a pop-up concert.
translation.fr:
Bobby m'emmène
à un concert dans le désert.

translation.en: Absolutely not. Hello.
Dad, it's fine. Just, like, give me the money.
Goodbye. Okay, but you know Bobby. You work with him.
translation.fr:
- Au revoir.
- Tu connais Bobby. Tu bosses avec lui.

translation.en: I know him? Bobby who?
Bobby Telatovich.
Yuri? That's the Bobby that you've been seeing? He's ten years older than you.
translation.fr:
Youri ? C'est lui, ton Bobby ?
Il a dix ans de plus que toi.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Erin.
Hello. Have a good day.
He's very sweet.
No, he's not. He is a bad, bad man.
Well, it wasn't my idea to move to this shithole.
translation.fr:
Je ne voulais pas venir
dans cette ville de merde.

translation.en: I never called this town a shithole. It's a very fine town. Very fine.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais dit ça.
C'est une très jolie ville.

translation.en: Well, I'm going with or without you, and I guess if I have no money,
translation.fr:
De toute façon, j'y vais.
Si je n'ai pas d'argent,

translation.en: I'll just be totally reliant on Bobby.
translation.fr: je devrai m'en remettre à Bobby.

translation.en: Have to do whatever Bobby says.
Don't play that game with me, Erin. It's not going to work.
translation.fr: Arrête ton manège, ça ne marchera pas.

translation.en: I'll talk it over with Mommy.
Thank you, General.
How you doing?
Okay.
-You eating all right? -Oh, yeah. Yeah.
They're letting me grow radishes in a window box, and I can pretty much eat them whenever I want.
translation.fr:
Je cultive des radis dans une jardinière,
je peux les manger quand je veux.

translation.en: -Nice. -Yeah.
And there's this guard, Louise,
she slips me some food sometimes.
translation.fr: me file à manger quand elle peut.

translation.en: Well, you look-- You look great.
[sighs] I miss you. Very much.
Mark, I'm gonna be in here a long time.
translation.fr: Mark, je vais rester en prison un moment.

translation.en: So if you need...
companionship--
No. I am your husband.
Yes, but I'll understand if you--
translation.fr: Oui, mais je comprendrai si tu...

translation.en: Absolutely not. I don't want you to bring this up again.
translation.fr: Pas question. Le débat est clos.

translation.en: Please.
How's Erin?
Erin wants to go to a concert in the desert this weekend
translation.fr:
Elle veut aller
à un concert dans le désert

translation.en: with this older Russian guy, who I think is just using her to get information.
translation.fr:
avec un Russe de 30 ans
qui se sert d'elle pour m'espionner.

translation.en: Eighteen is that age where you make mistakes
translation.fr: À 18 ans, on fait tous des erreurs,

translation.en: and figure some things out.
Do you think I should let her go?
Well, I just don't know how you can stop her.
Louise says if you can't do anything about a situation,
translation.fr:
Louise dit
que si la situation est irrémédiable,

translation.en: you might as well lean back and let it happen.
translation.fr: il vaut mieux se laisser porter.

translation.en: -Louise sounds like a good friend. -[Maggie] Well...
translation.fr: Elle a l'air de bon conseil.

translation.en: Oh, shoot. Gonna be late.
Set me down next to the BX, please.
Uh... I can't do that, sir.
I have to land on the designated pad.
I am telling you to do it, so you can do it.
translation.fr: Pour cette fois, je vous y autorise.

translation.en: I have a congressional delegation down there waiting for me.
Um, it's only another 100 yards, sir,
and I'm sure you're gonna do great with the delegation,
even if you are a minute late.
Thin ice, Captain. Thin ice.
translation.fr: Vous jouez avec le feu, capitaine.

translation.en: Hey, General? General. A word.
-I'm late for a meeting. -I ran the numbers,
translation.fr:
- Pas le temps.
- Selon mes calculs,

translation.en: and I can't put the bowling alley under the cyclotron unless the bowling alley is curved,
translation.fr:
le bowling ne passe pas sous le cyclotron
à moins d'être incurvé.

translation.en: -and I don't see how that works. -Get it done.
-I have complete confidence in you, ma'am. -Okay, it's Kelly. It's Kelly.
translation.fr:
- J'ai confiance en vous, madame.
- Je m'appelle Kelly.

translation.en: -Oh. Nice of you to join us. -My apologies.
Had a little chopper trouble.
So, uh, what's good here?
I would recommend the tuna.
Sushi?
How much are taxpayers paying to fly that in?
A sandwich.
I knew that. It was a joke.
And a good one.
But with a grain of truth.
Kick Grabaston at Air Force told us confidentially that this base was a complete waste of money.
translation.fr:
Kick Grabaston nous a confié
que cette base était une dépense inutile.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I assure you we are on track,
translation.fr:
Je vous rassure,
nous sommes dans les temps,

translation.en: and Epsilon will launch at 1700 hours.
And the Epsilon is the new spacecraft fighter, right?
That is correct.
What kind of armament will it have on board? Laser cannon? Pulse weapon?
translation.fr:
Quelles armes a-t-elle ?
Canon laser ? Rayon électromagnétique ?

translation.en: I believe those are from Star Wars.
translation.fr: Ça, c'est dans Star Wars, non ?

translation.en: But if I had a laser cannon,
translation.fr: Cela dit, si j'avais un canon laser,

translation.en: I would probably use it to cook a Wendy's hamburger.
translation.fr:
je m'en servirais
pour cuire un burger de Wendy's.

translation.en: The Epsilon is equipped with a kinetic disabling system.
translation.fr:
Epsilon est équipée
d'un incapacitateur cinétique.

translation.en: -Meaning? -It can eject a metal net,
and it is our hope that we can get this net
to tangle with enemy satellites.
Exploding them?
Tangling them.
This better be one fucking flawless launch.
translation.fr:
Ce lancement
n'a pas intérêt à partir en couille.

translation.en: Six billion for a net. Not a good look.
translation.fr: Six milliards pour un filet. Ça part mal.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -Oh, sorry. Excuse me.
Oh, God. I have to take this.
Dad, is everything all right?
Yeah, only your mom has run off again.
I can't see her. I'd run after her, but I think I had a small heart attack this morning.
translation.fr:
Elle a disparu. Je ne la poursuis pas,
j'ai fait un petit infarctus, ce matin.

translation.en: You know, I'm feeling a little draggy.
Okay, Dad, is the caretaker there? Please put the caretaker on.
He's on his way. He should be here any minute.
translation.fr: Il est en chemin, il arrive.

translation.en: So how's the lady situation?
[sighs] Well, as you know, my wife is in prison.
translation.fr: Comme tu le sais, elle est en prison.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You know what I had to do yesterday? I had to crawl under the house to check a leak.
translation.fr:
Hier, j'ai dû me faufiler sous la maison,
il y avait une fuite.

translation.en: No, Dad. Dad, don't do--
We have people to crawl under the house, Dad.
translation.fr: On a des gens qu'on paie pour ça.

translation.en: I crawled under. I didn't tell anybody, and they didn't know I was under there.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas prévenu,
ils ne me retrouvaient pas.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, Dad, don't, don't-- Don't crawl under the house!
translation.fr: Par pitié, papa, ne recommence pas !

translation.en: So how's things? How's your-- How's your wife?
translation.fr: Et toi, ça va ? Comment va ta femme ?

translation.en: She's fine.
Yeah, you two are gonna make a great couple.
translation.fr: Vous allez faire un super couple.

translation.en: -Is the caretaker there, Dad? -Uh, yeah.
-What are you doing? -Put the caretaker on. -Have to get in the house. -What? -Put the caretaker on. -Get in the house.
He wants to talk to you.
Oh, God. I don't know what to do. Your father should be in the hospital.
translation.fr:
Votre père va me rendre dingue.
Il faudrait l'hospitaliser.

translation.en: Your mama is somewhere in the streets in her nightgown.
translation.fr: Votre mère se balade en robe de chambre.

translation.en: Can you come home and help me?
I wish I could, Jean Baptiste, but I'm having kind of a day of it myself.
translation.fr:
Je ne peux pas,
j'ai une crise à gérer ici.

translation.en: And, please, don't let my dad go under the house again.
translation.fr: Empêchez mon père d'aller sous la maison.

translation.en: I try. You know he do whatever he want. -No, no, no, no! -Ask him...
translation.fr:
- J'essaie, il n'en fait qu'à sa tête.
- Demandez-lui...

translation.en: You have to keep eyes on him. Do you understand?
-Yes, Mr. Naird. -Ask him how his wife is.
-How is your wife? -Ugh, God.
All right, hold on a second, Jean Baptiste.
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ! Ne quittez pas.

translation.en: Brad, I'm going to need you to task the satellite
-over Nutley, New Jersey, again. -Yes, I'm on it.
She's in the Rite-Aid parking lot.
-Text me when she's in the car. -Okay. Thank you, Mr. Naird.
translation.fr:
- Prévenez-moi quand vous l'avez.
- Oui. Merci.

translation.en: [man] Oh, he is blowing it just like you thought.
translation.fr: Il fait de la merde, comme prévu.

translation.en: Yeah, it is a complete shit show.
My dry cleaner.
Yeah, yeah, they, uh, they lost my dress whites.
translation.fr: Ils ont perdu mon uniforme blanc.

translation.en: -I canceled the launch. -[gasps]
[panting] Mallory's waiting for you.
-He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.fr:
- Il m'a dit de ne rien dire.
- Merci.

translation.en: -I didn't say anything. -Well done, Bradley.
translation.fr:
- Je n'ai rien dit.
- Bien joué.

translation.en: -Oh, thank you, sir. -[Mark exhales]
It's a six-billion-dollar decision. We can't risk it.
translation.fr:
Six milliards de dollars sont en jeu.
C'est trop risqué.

translation.en: It's a lot for a scientist,
but in the military, we have to risk lives.
translation.fr: mais dans l'armée, on risque des vies.

translation.en: At 50 grand a year,
it would take 120,000 years to earn $6 billion.
translation.fr:
il faudrait 120 000 ans
pour gagner six milliards de dollars.

translation.en: That is the entire lifetime earnings of 3,000 people.
translation.fr:
Ça équivaut aux revenus
de toute une vie de 3 000 personnes.

translation.en: Now, how many times can a country waste the entire lifetime earnings
translation.fr:
Combien de fois un pays
peut-il gaspiller les revenus

translation.en: of thousands of its citizens without something really bad happening?
translation.fr:
de milliers de ses citoyens
avant de provoquer une révolution ?

translation.en: Are you still upset about the button covers?
A thousand dollars for a plastic button cover? That's insane!
translation.fr:
Un protège-bouton à 1 000 $ ?
On marche sur la tête !

translation.en: -So you think we'll be ready by Novem-- -[button clicks]
-[automated voice] Three. -[alarms blaring]
-Two. -Shit.
One.
[rocket engine whooshing]
Sorry.
How many times do I need to apologize?
translation.fr: Encore une fois, je suis désolé.

translation.en: Just come out to the launch site and we'll show you.
translation.fr:
Venez au site de lancement,
on va vous expliquer.

translation.en: The proper humidity for launch is 40 percent.
Today it is at 54 percent.
This can affect oxygenation and fuel burn.
translation.fr:
Ça peut perturber
l'oxygénation du carburant.

translation.en: The amount of fuel measured is very precise.
translation.fr: On mesure le carburant au millilitre près.

translation.en: If fuel is insufficient,
the rocket returns to Earth without reaching orbit.
translation.fr: la fusée n'entrera pas en orbite.

translation.en: Where you from, Chan?
-Ohio. -Originally?
What does that have to do with any-- Are--
Are you suggesting Chan is a Chinese spy?
translation.fr:
Vous soupçonnez Chan
d'espionnage pour la Chine ?

translation.en: Ah. So we have heard from Mr. Chan.
translation.fr: On a entendu l'avis de M. Chan.

translation.en: -Doctor. -Dr. Chan.
I'd like to hear another opinion.
Perhaps somebody willing to dissent from the party line.
Who'd like to give me a good reason why we should launch today?
translation.fr:
Qui a une bonne raison
pour la lancer aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: Anyone?
So I can weigh the pros and cons?
translation.fr: Pour peser le pour et le contre.

translation.en: Don't you have any mavericks on your team, Mallory?
translation.fr:
Vous n'avez aucun dissident
dans l'équipe ?

translation.en: -I say launch. -Great.
And you are Dr....
Just call me Eddie.
-Oh, shit. -Ain't a doctor. I go to a bunch of 'em, though.
translation.fr:
- Merde.
- Chuis pas docteur. Mais j'en vois plein.

translation.en: Wonderful. So those in favor of postponement
are me and Dr. Chan, Dr. Swedberg,
translation.fr: moi-même, le Dr Chan, le Dr Swedberg,

translation.en: Dr. Bohr, Dr. Revredesh,
translation.fr: le Dr Bohr, le Dr Revredesh,

translation.en: Dr. Yamato, Dr. Lowenstein,
translation.fr: le Dr Yamato, le Dr Lowenstein,

translation.en: Dr. Washington, and Dr. Zisk.
translation.fr: le Dr Washington et le Dr Zisk.

translation.en: In favor of launch are you and Eddie.
translation.fr: En faveur du lancement : vous et Eddie.

translation.en: Any last name, Eddie?
None that I care to mention.
Chan, what's behind your back?
It's an umbrella, sir.
Did you think it was a sword cane? Samurai sword?
translation.fr:
Vous vous attendiez
à une canne-épée ou un katana ?

translation.en: Would you like to examine it, sir?
No, we are done here.
[Mallory] So the launch is scrubbed?
I can't hear you over the rotors.
-Well, this is absurd. -[chattering]
So is this actually happening or not?
There's no point if it's not happening...
Excuse me, congresspeople.
no interruptions for five minutes.
[softly] ♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪
♪ Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
translation.fr:
Bermudes et Bahamas
Viens ici, ma jolie

translation.en: ♪ Key Largo, Montego Baby, why don't we go? ♪
translation.fr:
Key Largo, Montego
Ma chérie, allons-y

translation.en: ♪ Jamaica, off the Florida keys ♪
translation.fr: En Jamaïque au large de la Floride

translation.en: ♪ There's a place called Kokomo ♪
translation.fr: Il y a une île du nom de Kokomo

translation.en: ♪ That's where you wanna go To get away from it all ♪
translation.fr:
C'est là qu'il faut aller
Si on veut s'évader

translation.en: ♪ Bodies in the sand ♪
♪ Tropical drinks melting in your hand ♪
translation.fr: Un cocktail tropical à la main

translation.en: ♪ We'll be falling in love To the rhythm of a steel drum band ♪
translation.fr:
On tombera amoureux
Au rythme des percussions

translation.en: ♪ Down in Koko-- ♪
They're gone.
Congresspeople! Congresspeople!
The launch is on.
-What? -See you at 1700.
But you--
Sheila? Yeah.
Don't, don't-- Please don't skitter away.
Please, this is for your own safety.
Come on. I'm trying to save you! Damn it, get back here.
translation.fr: Allez ! J'essaie de vous sauver ! Revenez, merde !

translation.en: Our country, the oldest democracy in the world,
translation.fr:
Notre pays,
la plus ancienne démocratie au monde,

translation.en: put a man on the moon.
translation.fr: a envoyé un homme sur la Lune.

translation.en: It was perhaps our greatest moment up until that point.
translation.fr:
C'était peut-être
notre plus grand exploit jusqu'alors.

translation.en: Alongside the Constitution, the Bill of Rights,
translation.fr:
Avec la Constitution
et la Déclaration des droits.

translation.en: and, of course, the Miracle on Ice.
translation.fr: Et le miracle sur glace, bien sûr.

translation.en: Today we launch Epsilon 6,
a collaborative effort between the scientists of the United States,
translation.fr:
un effort collectif
des scientifiques des États-Unis,

translation.en: Japan, Europe, Turkey, Israel, Australia,
translation.fr:
du Japon, d'Europe,
de Turquie, d'Israël, d'Australie

translation.en: -and our old enemy, Russia. -[phone camera clicks]
translation.fr: et de notre ancienne ennemie, la Russie.

translation.en: And this will bring us one step closer to returning to the moon,
translation.fr:
C'est un premier pas
vers un retour sur la Lune,

translation.en: and, from there, to Mars.
There will be setbacks along the way.
translation.fr: Il y aura des obstacles à surmonter.

translation.en: There are risks to every great endeavor.
But greatness was never won without suffering.
translation.fr:
Mais il est impossible
d'atteindre la gloire sans souffrance

translation.en: And sacrifice.
I am so, so damn proud of all of you.
translation.fr: Je suis tellement fier de vous tous.

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, my God. He's really on the edge.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu. Il est au bout du rouleau.

translation.en: [clears throat] So...
without further ado,
with this button,
I so launch...
Epsilon 6.
-Liked the Miracle on Ice reference. -Thank you, Brad.
Aw. I should be tweeting this.
Where'd it go?
[whispering] What's going on? Did it blow up?
Not yet.
Epsilon 6 is in orbit.
Yeah, well, he'll probably have me transferred tomorrow
translation.fr: Il va sans doute me transférer demain,

translation.en: once he has a moment to think about it.
translation.fr: quand il aura pu y réfléchir.

translation.en: [scoffs] But what was I supposed to do?
You put a helicopter down in the wrong spot,
and someone could get their head removed.
translation.fr: je risque de décapiter un passant.

translation.en: Hang on a second, Mom.
"Sorry I snapped at you. Glad you're on our team."
translation.fr:
"Pardon de m'être emporté.
Content de vous avoir dans l'équipe."

translation.en: [Mallory] You know, there's one thing that I don't get.
You were right about the launch,
yet you don't know anything about science.
translation.fr:
alors que vous êtes béotien
en matière de science.

translation.en: Guess I know a little about people.
translation.fr: Je suis bon juge de caractère.

translation.en: When we we're out at the launch site, there were two tiny clouds in the sky.
translation.fr:
Au site de lancement,
il n'y avait que deux petits nuages.

translation.en: Chan had an umbrella.
People like that can't handle any risk at all.
translation.fr:
Ce genre de gens
ne supporte pas le risque.

translation.en: There's no way we are getting back to the moon
translation.fr: On ne retournera jamais sur la Lune

translation.en: with that kind of thinking.
That's a good observation. Well reasoned.
Cheers.
Thank you, Doctor.
You know what?
Epsilon should be passing right about now.
translation.fr:
Epsilon devrait
être en train de nous survoler.

translation.en: -[Mark sighs] -Do you see it?
Oh, yeah, there's a spark.
Beautiful. Wow.
[Mark] I got it.
[Mallory] Wait, is that a second spark?
[inhaling sharply] Motherfucker!
♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪  ♪ To Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
♪ I want to take you down to Kokomo ♪
